item.title: Election Integrity Activists Hit The Road To Save The SAVE Act
item.description: On Monday, Tea Party Patriots Action will roll out its inaugural Only Citizens Vote Bus Tour, a trek covering more than a dozen states.

item.title: Americans Who ‘Learned To Code’ At Obama’s Behest Can’t Find Jobs Now
item.description: 'Learn to code' turned out to be one of the most misguided pieces of career advice, and college grads are bearing the brunt of it.

item.title: Bombshell DNI Emails Expose Fraud That Sabotaged 2018 Trump-Putin Summit
item.description: The new release by Gabbard is a vindication for Trump, who stood alone in 2018, and strengthens his position ahead of the upcoming summit.
